lines.text: All those kids yours mister, or is this a picnic?
They're all mine and believe me, it's no picnic!
Hey Noah, what are you doing with that Ark?
Collecting animals like the good Lord told me brother. All we need now is a jackass. Hop in!
Oh, these aren't so many. You ought to see the ones we left behind.
Oh, they come cheaper by the dozen.
No person with inner dignity is ever embarrassed.

[while escorting Ann out of the house on her first date]
I know its not your fault Lilly, but things would have been a whole lot easier if you'd taken my advice and had all boys.
I'm sorry, dear. I'll try to be more careful with the next dozen.
